entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023
